welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pandacan, Philippines! This vibrant city is known for its colorful festivals, rich history, and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy exploring all the charm and beauty that Pandacan has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it is the newest and main international terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves only domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in some areas.
